Quickstrike:





Quickstrike slowly stood up, having his back slam into the crates behind 
him. He was going to pay for that.

"What in tarnation is yer problem?" he shouted. "Ya still got uh gripe after 
them auto-guns? Dang, ya never quit! It's over Shreds! Ya shoulda stayed by 
mah tail when we's were goin' in."
